ygData.subject: Clerics and the art of Dueling
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail fellow Clerics, I have witnessed and read about many adventurers dueling to test their skills or to settle a dispute.  However, I have never seen a Cleric
ygData.messageBody:
Hail fellow Clerics,


I have witnessed and read about many adventurers dueling to
test their skills or to settle a dispute. However, I have
never seen a Cleric duel nor have heard of one.

Since we are in charge of Saving lives, how do we tune
ourselves to Take a life? Clerics are far from being cowards,
but to decline a duel or be somewhat at a loss durring a
potential guild war, can bring shame upon the class.

So I ask, are there any dueling clerics out there that can
lend their experiences to a beginning duelest? I am a level
19 cleric but I wish to open the discussion to all levels.
Tips for fighting hybrids, magic using classes, and especially
adventureres that are of lvls higher than yourself.


//Aldaren
"There is no comfort between the Craddle and the Grave..."-unknown
